name: vrt-core
description: Core Smart Contracts for Vehicle Registration Token Project, a protocol for trace vehicle's property and their history in Ethereum blockchain.

scripts.build-contract-abi: docker run --rm -v %cd%/:/src ethereum/solc:stable --abi --include-path /src/node_modules/ -o /src/abis --base-path . /src/contracts/VehicleMarketplace.sol --overwrite && docker run --rm -v %cd%/:/src ethereum/solc:stable --abi --include-path /src/node_modules/ -o /src/abis --base-path . /src/contracts/VehicleRegistrationToken.sol --overwrite
